title: Nuts & Bolts Party - Singles 23-45 - Icebreaker, Live DJ
desc: Please note: This is NOT an ATWYS event, this is a "partner" event we are promoting for another singles company. It's time again for one of our most popular Meetups!?As seen on ABC News, a Nuts & Bolts party is a unique, slightly sexy?& great way to meet upscale, outgoing?& attractive singles! ? Don't miss this Meetup and?screw?yourself out of the chance to find your right?fit...You'd be?nuts?not to attend. No?tools?allowed :)  ? ? ? Drink Specials & Snacks: ? ??2 For 1 Drinks (8:30-9:30pm) ? ??FREE Shot for all this month's birthdays ? ??FREE Snacks for everybody ?   ? Ice Breakers: ? ?? You will either receive a nut or a bolt ? ?? The object is to find the nut that fits the bolt ? ?? Return matching hardware to bar & receive a FREE shot ?   ?
